attributes.action: WHY DOES THE UK GOVERNMENT CARE MORE FOR MIGRANTS THAN ITS OWN PEOPLE IN THE UK?
attributes.additional_details: Most news papers and TV are covering it every week!
attributes.background:
1 Introduce legislation to put the countries people and culture first into law!
2 Deport illegal immigrants
3 Make English the official language, Don't learn it have to leave
4 Stop giving all the money an homes to migrants over people that and were born in the culture!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action that is within their power. We also can’t accept petitions if we already have a petition on the same subject open on the site.

You may be interested in signing the following petitions, which cover some of the requests in your petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105658
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109451
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106238
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107787
